title: Ball In The Family (US) (1988)
description:
.......:::Screenshots:::.......

 
http://imagedisco.net/?v=1273072036
 
http://imagedisco.net/?g=8384892991

Itchy and Eatit Bonker have a nice house in Queens, a very beautiful girl who is a nymphomaniac, a mooching s-on-in-law who is hung like horse, and a fondness for fooling around every chance they get. Come spend a day with them as they try to keep it, Ball in the Family.



Edith and Archie are having affairs. Gloria and Meathead are balling the neighbors. They had something great here, but thanks to stagnant direction and a lack of variety in the way the erotic scenes are presented, this one is only above average. Round Jeremy gives a funny performance as Itchy and Shauna McCullough is right on as Eat-It Bunker. But the stationary camera never lets us get to know these characters. Instead it's assembly-line sex scenes, with a few being fairly hot. Shauna McCullough has a good time with Rick Savage and Jessica Longe returns for a raucous stint with Michael Knight. The living room setting is perfect, right down to Itchy's chair. The producers just needed to hire someone to direct. Not quite as good as this company's Horneymooners parody
